body: Grasshope, The keyword search in this component uses the same exact function as the keyword "Call from EP Construction Library" component and these both accept multiple keyword searches: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HI85JtglDaoP1ZEJnwxyoPnH-3smpGAPzv052ofxhXg*b3VVgaxV9NXHfDJO2ac9ZQhJIHggTJtQLYIVaaT8htyMKMGV-1Sp/MultipleInputs.JPG) I think the issue that you are pointing to is that you want to use an OR operator between your two keywords instead of the default AND operator.  In this case, just plug in your keywords as a single text string with a space between them like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HI85JtglDarRpZknnIUmTof1j*xCcbMOJfSPT7WsPGdememt7gwKj9yLYk*PeEtlmmcve-hgOqohuHY4KSUj0Bs6jHhYioQl/KeywordsOrOperator.JPG) And this will only bring up the results that contain both sets of keywords. -Chris
